glassfish.security.auth.jdbc.util.factory.passwordtypes

Interface IPasswordType

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BcryptPassword, MessageDigestPassword, UnencryptedPassword

    public interface IPasswordType
    IPasswordType interface corresponding to a password encryption type instancied and returned by PasswordTypeFactory.

    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    RienderieN

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkPassword(String plainPassword, String hashedPassword)
      Check that a plaintext password matches a previously encrypted one.
      String encryptPassword(String password)
      Encrypt a plaintext password and return it.

    • Method Detail

      • encryptPassword

        String encryptPassword(String password)
        Encrypt a plaintext password and return it.

        Parameters:
        password - A plaintext password to encrypt
        Returns:
        A encrypted password

      • checkPassword

        boolean checkPassword(String plainPassword,
                    String hashedPassword)
        Check that a plaintext password matches a previously encrypted one.

        Parameters:
        plainPassword - A plaintext password to check.
        hashedPassword - A previously encrypted password.
        Returns:
        true if the the passwords match, false otherwise.
